alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:56AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: Areas of dense freezing fog, light freezing drizzle and light snow have developed as colder air behind an Arctic cold front moves into the area. Visibility may briefly drop to as low as a quarter of a mile in the fog. A light glaze of ice may be deposited on roadways, sidewalks and elevated surfaces. Snow accumulations of less than one inch are expected, mainly this afternoon. Use extra caution if traveling through this afternoon due to the slick conditions. A Wind Chill Advisory remains in effect for tonight and Friday morning as temperatures will continue to fall. Low temperatures will be around zero with wind chills around 15 below.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
